title: New league of legends map needed!!
body: Hey does anyone else think that league of legends should make a new map because having only a few gets very repetitive and sometimes boring. We are shown that in hexakill that riot games have the capability of holding a 6v6 match so how about they make a new map for 6v6 and something that is unique. so please reply with your thoughts everyone.

replies.body: I think we need a custom game mode, where I can set the amount of gold I get and cooldowns for practice and stuff

I respect this but Riot would just make a game mode where you have everything maxed so:
- 40% CD.
- 1,000,000 gold (definitely enough to buy all items needed).
- Max level

I personally think this is a good idea a good way to try new builds, strategies, and really fun.
